Job.title: Job
Job.description: Represents a job posting within the PathSynch Careers application.

title.description: The title of the job posting.

department.description: The department to which the job belongs.

city.description: The primary city for the job location.

state.description: The primary state for the job location.

remoteOption.description: Indicates if the position has a remote work option.

remoteType.description: The type of remote work arrangement.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the job was created.

order.description: The display order of the job.

applicationMethod.description: The method by which candidates can apply.

Application.title: Application
Application.description: Represents a job application submitted by a user.

firstName.description: The first name of the applicant.

lastName.description: The last name of the applicant.

email.description: The email address of the applicant.

phone.description: The phone number of the applicant.

linkedinUrl.description: The LinkedIn profile URL of the applicant.

coverLetter.description: The cover letter submitted by the applicant.

portfolioUrl.description: The portfolio URL of the applicant.

availableStartDate.description: The date the applicant is available to start.

experienceYears.description: The number of years of experience of the applicant.

status.description: The status of the application (e.g., submitted, in review, rejected).

screeningStatus.description: The AI screening status of the application (e.g., pending, completed).

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the application was created.

/applications/{applicationId}.description: Stores job applications submitted by users.
